questions.question: 1. Which of the following best describes the concept of a metapopulation?

answers.a: A population that has become spatially subdivided
answers.b: A network of distinct and non-interacting species
answers.c: An assemblage of populations of different species living in the same geographic location at the same time
answers.d: A population in an urban area

questions.question: 2. In Levins model d, the dispersal is the ________________

answers.a: Degree to which the environments of the two subpopulations vary with regards to each other
answers.b: Initial number of individuals in the population
answers.c: Population growth rate in good years
answers.d: Probability that the individual disperse from its sub population

questions.question: 3. Populations of ________ and ___________are good examples of metapopulation.

answers.b: Ground squirrels and Logger head turtle
